segments.text: Excuse me . Can I change my seat with you ? I want to sit beside my friend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 9 - A in the middle part , a window seat too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , you mean the vacant one on the left ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . Thank you very much . Let me help you to carry your baggage there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No need . I have only this small handbag with me .
segments.speaker: S2
